import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import AuthForm from'./components/auth/AuthForm';import Dashboard from'./components/dashboard/Dashboard';import Profile from'./components/profile/Profile';import AdminDashboard from'./components/admin/AdminDashboard';import NotFound from'./components/layout/NotFound';import'./App.css';// Set default headers for axios
